 Anyway, back to the topic.
 I was watching Annan and Bush at the UN today. Annan started talking about all the things around the world that need UN fixin'. Sudan and Iraq were two obvious areas. One thing that he brought up that I guess I never thought about. He talked about the fact that all these world leaders in the UN will sit around and talk about things, draw up resolutions, and wait. But, nobody is rushing to pay the bills. He was basically saying that the UN can't do squat unless somebody pays for it. There hasn't been enough chipping in on the part of interested parties to solve most of these problems. Anyway, that's just one of the reasons why the UN, as an organization, is so ineffectual at times.
